Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Rapidly \Rap"id*ly\ (r[a^]p"[i^]d*l[y^]), adv. In a rapid manner. [1913 Webster]
rapidly adv : with rapid movements; "he works quickly" [syn: {quickly}, {speedily}, {chop-chop}, {apace}] [ant: {slowly}]
